long_description:
Thanks to **X17**, he showed me how to make a texturepack and how to share it.


1st version of this texturepack. It contains textures of simple blocks, like wood or stone

2nd version of this texturepack. It contains all around ores, for example, lumps and ingots
name: standart_textures
title: Standart Textures (64px)
